## Array Spot Log Intensity Images
```{r array-spot-log-intensity-images-OLIGO,  eval=(plots == "OLIGO"),echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:count){
  oligo::image(raw, transfo=log2, which=i)
  }
```
```{r array-spot-log-intensity-images-LIMMA,  eval=(plots == "LIMMA"),echo=FALSE}
for (ind in 1:count){
  if (targets$platform == "Agilent"){
  r <- raw$genes$Row
  c <- raw$genes$Col
  nr <- max(r)
  nc <- max(c)
  i <- (r-1)*nc+c
  y <- rep(NA,length(i))
  y[i] <- log2(raw$Eb[,ind])
  raw$printer <- list(ngrid.r=1,ngrid.c=1,nspot.r=nr,nspot.c=nc) 
}
  try(imageplot(y,raw$printer, main=colnames(raw$Eb)[ind]))
  ## fix imageplot printer columns
  }
```

## Raw Data MA Plots
```{r ma-plots-OLIGO,  eval=(plots == "OLIGO"), echo=FALSE}
printrows <- ceiling(count/2)
if (class(raw) %in% c("ExpressionFeatureSet"))  {
	for (i in 1:count){
	  plotted <- oligo::MAplot(raw, which=i, pairs=FALSE, main="\nvs pseudo-median reference chip")
	}
} else {
	stop(sprintf("Unsupported raw class '%s' in MA plot cell", class(raw) ) )
}

```
```{r ma-plots-LIMMA,  eval=(plots == "LIMMA"), echo=FALSE}
count <- dim(targets$t1)[1]
printrows <- ceiling(count/2)
for (i in 1:count){
  limma::plotMD(raw, column = i, xlab = "Average log-expression", ylab = "log-fold-change", main = colnames(raw)[i])
  }
```

## Raw Data Density Plot
```{r density-plot-OLIGO,  eval=(plots == "OLIGO"), echo=FALSE}

  oligo::hist(raw, main = paste0(targets$glds," Raw Intensity Distributions"), target="probeset",xlab="Intensity",ylab="Density",col=rainbow(count),lty=1)

}else{
  oligo::hist(raw, main = paste0(targets$glds," Raw Intensity Distributions"),xlab="Intensity",ylab="Density",col=rainbow(count),lty=1)
  legend("topright",legend=targets$t1$SampleName,fill = rainbow(count))
}

```

## Raw Data Box Plot
```{r box-plots-OLIGO, eval=(plots == "OLIGO"), echo=FALSE}
longest_sample_name_length <- max(nchar(sampleNames(raw))) * 0.5
bottom_margin <- min(30, longest_sample_name_length)
par(mar=c(bottom_margin,2,1,1))
if (class(raw)=="ExonFeatureSet" || class(raw)=="GeneFeatureSet"){
oligo::boxplot(raw,which="pm",transfo=log2, nsample=10000,main=paste0(targets$glds," Raw Data Log2 Intensities"), las=2,outline=FALSE,ylab = "log2 Intensities", target="probeset")
}else{
oligo::boxplot(raw,which="pm",transfo=log2, nsample=10000,main=paste0(targets$glds," Raw Data Log2 Intensities"), las=2,outline=FALSE,ylab = "log2 Intensities")
}
```
```{r box-plots-LIMMA,  eval=(plots == "LIMMA"), echo=FALSE}
longest_sample_name_length <- max(nchar(sampleNames(raw))) * 0.5
bottom_margin <- min(30, longest_sample_name_length)
par(mar=c(bottom_margin,2,1,1))
boxplot(data.frame(log2(as.matrix(raw))),main="Raw Data Log2 Intensities", las=2,outline=FALSE)
```

## Raw Data PCA Plot
```{r pca-plot,  echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
try(exp_raw <- log2(exprs(raw)))
try(exp_raw <- log2(as.matrix(raw)))
PCA_raw <- prcomp(t(exp_raw), scale. = FALSE)
try({PCA_raw <- prcomp(t(exp_raw), scale. = TRUE)}) # scaling will fail for low replicates
percentVar <- round(100*PCA_raw$sdev^2/sum(PCA_raw$sdev^2),1)
sd_ratio <- sqrt(percentVar[2] / percentVar[1])
dataGG <- data.frame(PC1 = PCA_raw$x[,1], PC2 = PCA_raw$x[,2], Group = targets$t1$Group)
PCA_plot <- ggplot(dataGG, aes(PC1, PC2)) +
      geom_point(aes(colour = Group)) +
  ggtitle("Raw Data PCA Plot of log2 Expression") +
  xlab(paste0("PC1, VarExp: ", percentVar[1], "%")) +
  ylab(paste0("PC2, VarExp: ", percentVar[2], "%"))
plot(PCA_plot)

```
